Senate Bill 140

Introduced ( html | pdf )

SB 140 Printed pursuant to Senate Interim Rule 213.28 by order of the President of the Senate in conformance with presession filing rules, indicating neither advocacy nor opposition on the part of the President. (at the request of Governor John A. Kitzhaber for Occupational Therapy Licensing Board) (at the request of Governor John A. Kitzhaber for Occupational Therapy Licensing Board) -- Relating to the Occupational Therapy Licensing Board; declaring an emergency.
01/10 (S) Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
01/12 (S) Referred to Health Care, Human Services and Rural Health Policy.
02/09 (S) Public Hearing held.
02/16 (S) Work Session held.
02/22 (S) Recommendation: Do pass.
02/22 (S) Second reading.
02/24 (S) Third reading. Carried by Shields. Passed. Ayes, 19; nays, 11--Atkinson, Boquist, Ferrioli, George, Girod, Kruse, Olsen, Starr, Telfer, Thomsen, Whitsett.
02/24 (S) Vote explanation(s) filed by Ferrioli.
02/28 (H) First reading. Referred to the desks of the Co-Speakers.
03/07 (H) Referred to Health Care.
